title: Searching for a geometric sans with character for logo
content:
Making a logo around the word "good"  
Client has specified an all-caps San serif, pointing to an example using Gotham as something she likes. Problem is, the letters in "GOOD" are all very similar looking.  
So any suggestions from the typophiles? Your advice is usually bang on :)  
I think if I could find a nice "G" I'm most of the way there.

Cheers
author: JuliusFernie

comments.content: Like it! Esp. the different styles; nice UC "G" too

KLTF Tiptoe is not geometric but it has lots of character  
 [http://kltf.de/kltf\_tiptoe.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416072432/http:/kltf.de/kltf_tiptoe.shtml "http://kltf.de/kltf\_tiptoe.shtml")

"Client has specified an all-caps San serif"

Then you should present a good solution like that, but you can also present other ideas. I love it when a client says "your idea looks better".
